articles.description: The District Consumer Disputes Redressal Commission-I in Chandigarh recently ordered MakeMyTrip, OYO Rooms and a hotel in Goa to pay a sum of ₹42,000 to a Chand
articles.content: The bench headed by the Commissions President Pawanjit Singh and comprising Members Surjeet Kaur and Suresh Kumar Sardana ordered the errant parties to pay the complainant 35,000 as compensation, apa… [+509 chars]
